name: rufflib-validate
description: A RuffLIB library for succinctly validating JavaScript values.

scripts.build: npm run clean && rollup -c && mkdir docs/dist && cp dist/* docs/dist
scripts.clean: rm -r dist; rm -r docs/dist; rm -r docs/test
scripts.test:docs: node docs/run-nodejs-tests.js # test docs/ using NodeJS
scripts.test:src: node src/run-nodejs-tests.js # test src/ using NodeJS
